text: Since i was a child i wanted to be like a good example to others and this grew up with me until now . i lost my dad when i was 12 and my mom when i was 16  and with  time i realize that the lost of parents could have an important impact in the life of a child for his future . No matter where , even if it's a south african child or an american one these childrens need people to be there for them . Most of them have good intentions , they want to go to school , learn many things but unfortunately nowadays we can say that they are put on side whereas kids with parents they have lots of money have  good opportunity at school . The person that inspire me is myself and the situation that ispire me the most is mine . i'am an orphan and i wanna help orphans . In my entire life i work hard because i wanted a person to tell me that he was proud of me  . kids need to be loved and they want to be cheered too , like that they will  want to continue and not let everything going away like i was about to do . What the unicef association do is really important for me ans we can say that is thank to them that i want to be like them or more i'll maybe be the director of an orphenage . Also i took the exemple of an orphan but let's take a kid who don't really have money bu don't forget that this kid is verry intelligent and polite . This kid won't go to school because nowadays you have to pay for school . I wan't to give them the opportunity to grow up like all other child even if they are orphan or poor i will do all possible for them
